name: Ensigns
description:
A downloadable game for Windows and macOS, made for Ludum Dare 43.

Put ensigns in danger so the captain can save the prisoners.

Well, it’s not quite Lemmings, it’s not quite Cannon Fodder, but man… So to answer your question, I don’t know. There was no time to work on level generation or make a proper level,  so this is basically just the test room I worked in, so is more of a concept than a game in it's current state.

Controls

Click ensigns to select them.

Click to walk, double click to run.
